publications

Yoo, A. H., Keglovits, H., & Collins, A. (2023). Lowered inter-stimulus discriminability hurts incremental contributions to learning. Cognitive, Affective, & Behavioral Neuroscience, 23(5), 1346-1364. [pdf] [link]

Badre, D., Bhandari, A., Keglovits, H., & Kikumoto, A. (2021). The dimensionality of neural representations for control. Current Opinion in Behavioral Sciences, 38, 20-28. [pdf] [link]

Buyukyazgan, D., Bhandari, A., Keglovits, H., Badre, D. (2023). Practice-related effects of dorsolateral prefrontal cortex representational geometry on context-dependent behavior. Annual Society for Neuroscience Meeting. Poster, Washington DC.
